function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of urban green infrastructure","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to lack of natural barriers and air purification","Mitigation":"Increase the availability of green spaces and urban vegetation to create natural barriers and improve air quality","Technologies":"Vertical gardens, green roofs, urban forestry, air purification systems","People":"Urban population","Owner":"City planners, urban developers, local government"},{"Description":"Inadequate interdisciplinary discourse","Impact":"Limited understanding and collaboration between disciplines, leading to ineffective solutions","Mitigation":"Facilitate knowledge sharing and collaboration between disciplines to develop comprehensive solutions","Technologies":"Interdisciplinary workshops, online platforms for knowledge exchange, joint research projects","People":"Researchers, policymakers, urban planners","Owner":"Universities, research institutions, government organizations"},{"Description":"Variability of legislation aspects","Impact":"Inconsistent implementation of green infrastructure policies, hindering effective urban resilience","Mitigation":"Develop standardized guidelines and frameworks for green infrastructure implementation across different regions","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, policy modeling tools, digital platforms for policy dissemination","People":"Urban planners, policymakers, legislators","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations"}]}
